title: Analysis of f from Taylor Polynomial part - d

content.description: Let P(x)=7−3(x−4)+5(x−4)2−2(x−4)3+6(x−4)4 be the fourth-degree Taylor polynomial for the function f about 4. Assume f has derivatives of all orders for all real numbers.
content.question: Can f(3) be determined from the information given? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Can f(3) be determined from the information given? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 10.11: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor Polynomial Approximations of Functions

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
